post.summary: Set TSA configuration values with proper sensitive data handling
post.description:
Only saves configuration if tsa_url is provided. Automatically manages username/password fields based on authentication type.
This endpoint requires admin access

parameters.description: Filter by serial number (partial match)

parameters.description: Sort order (ASC or DESC)
